column6: {'id': '26194654', 'name': 'Hilton Yala Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 131, 'locationString': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.257097, 'longitude': 81.40043, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g3748686-d26194654-Reviews-Hilton_Yala_Resort-Palatupana_Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/kdwyahi-hilton-yala-resort/', 'address': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Palatupana', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '95000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 4, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 122}}
column10: Make sure you book your safaris though the hotel, absolutely the best jungle experience.
column12:
Hilton Yala Resort is one of those top notch and iconic properties worldwide.
I went to Yala for the wildlife, perhaps no other better location to enjoy the fauna and flora in Sri Lanka in terms of wildlife density and beauty. Sajith the head ranger is superb, among the best, if not the best, ranger in Sri Lanka. Multiple safari drives yielded several leopard (and a stunning variety of wildlife) sightings, including some rare and endangered species.
The creature comforts in this luxurious resort are stunning. Amazing accommodations, incredible cuisine and gastronomy, amenities and lovely Sri Lankan hospitality and curated service.  HYR will be a regular part of the itinerary on all visits to Sri Lanka, the motherland.
column13: Amazing wildlife encounters and superb pampering

column5:
{'id': '976775701', 'text': "Dear Sachini,

Thank you so much for your incredible review! We‚Äôre truly honored to have been one of your bucket-list destinations, and it was a pleasure to welcome you and be part of such a memorable stay for you and your husband (a fellow Jurassic Park fan‚Äîhow exciting!).

Our team, including myself, Sachini, and Nisansala, had such a great time getting to know you and making sure your experience was everything you hoped for. We're thrilled that you enjoyed the unique design and luxury of Hilton Yala, from the private Jacuzzi or pool in your room to the expansive main pool, and that the natural beauty of Yala National Park added to your experience. It‚Äôs wonderful to hear that Chef Jerome‚Äôs culinary offerings hit the mark as well‚Äîhe will be delighted by your compliments.

We are indeed committed to preserving the incredible flora and fauna of the park, and we appreciate your attention to this as a guest. Thank you for acknowledging our team‚Äôs dedication to keeping the natural environment safe and accessible for all to enjoy. We‚Äôre so glad the 24/7 buggy and ranger service was helpful in making your exploration around the resort smooth and enjoyable.

We‚Äôre looking forward to welcoming you back someday! Until then, thank you for sharing your experience with others. Please know you have friends here at Hilton Yala, and we can‚Äôt wait to create even more special memories for you next time.

Warmest regards,", 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-10-27', 'responder': None, 'connectionToSubject': None}
column6: {'id': '26194654', 'name': 'Hilton Yala Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 131, 'locationString': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.257097, 'longitude': 81.40043, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g3748686-d26194654-Reviews-Hilton_Yala_Resort-Palatupana_Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/kdwyahi-hilton-yala-resort/', 'address': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Palatupana', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '95000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 4, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 122}}
column12:
Here‚Äôs the shout out to the most recent member of the Hilton Family, Hilton Yala Resort. This was one of my bucket lists resort from the day it was opened for public (not so long ago). The hotel architecture was inspired by the Award winning masterpiece of Steven Spielberg‚Äôs Jurassic Park. (Ironically my husband is a diehard fan of Jurassic park üòâand he mentioned that there‚Äôs a Hilton Hotel in the one of the Jurassic park movies)

The resort is modern, elegant, classy and luxurious. The architecture is mesmerizing.

Rooms are very comfortable, cozy and of course blend with modern technology. You will have your own private Jacuzzi or pool according to the room type you have selected. Not only that they have a huge swimming pool too.

Staff is welcoming, super helpful, attentive, friendly. They will take care of everything on your behalf. You will be pampered a lot. üòâ
Huge thanks to Vino, Sachini (not me üòâ), Nisansala and all the others who made our stay a wonderful experience (sorry I couldn‚Äôt recall others names ü•∫)

The food was delicious and had lot of verities to try out. The Executive Chef Jerome was so attentive and even personally talked to each and every guest to get their comments and suggestions.

Since the hotel located inside a National park, all the guests must acknowledge that we have entered into the natural habitat of the flora and fauna & not to damage or harm them. Resort is very specific about this and there‚Äôs 24/7 buggy service if you want to travel here and there; they will arrange rangers to take you to the beach too. Please adhere to the safety guidelines given by the resort for your own safety.

This is one of the best places you must experience, so hope you will add this to your bucket list. I will definitely come back.

column12:
The Hilton Yala staff went over and above to make our stay in the National Park perfect. All staff were friendly, attentive and showed an active interest in our family and our enjoyment of our time there. The rooms and grounds were kept pristine (even despite the Monkeys causing chaos at night) and everything was so carefully thought of. 

The restaurant food was of the highest standard, we ate 3 meals a day despite not being too hungry as we wanted to try what they had to offer. The chef cooked us up an incredible Sri Lankan taster menu one of the evenings which was the best meal we had whilst in Sri Lanka and even made our little boy a baby friendly curry. 

Our Safari Ranger Sanka was so friendly, knowledgeable and clearly very keen to make sure we had the best morning safari we could. We were originally going to use an outside safari company but are now so glad we didn‚Äôt. 

Thank you to all the team at Hilton, you made our stay and we will definitely be returning in a few years time when our little one is a bit older.

column5:

Thank you so much for taking the time to share such a thoughtful review of your recent stay at Hilton Yala Resort!

We‚Äôre also happy to hear that you enjoyed the beach walks and the insights from our ranger about the local wildlife and plants ‚Äî we take great pride in the natural beauty of our surroundings. column12:
Our stay at Hilton Yala Resort in early October was wonderful. We spent three days here, and despite it being the low season, the weather was great ‚Äî brief rain showers were refreshing, and the clouds kept us from getting sunburned.

The hotel is stylish and cozy, the rooms are comfortable, and the staff is incredibly attentive, anticipating our every need. The food was exceptional ‚Äî every dish was exquisite, and the waitstaff‚Äôs recommendations were spot on.

We especially loved the beach walks with a ranger, who shared interesting facts about local wildlife and plants. There‚Äôs even a small pond on the property with a baby crocodile!

Thank you for the fantastic stay, we‚Äôll definitely be back!
column13: ‚ÄúPerfect Stay at Hilton Yala Resort: Comfort, Nature, and Exceptional Service‚Äù

column5:
{'id': '972533332', 'text': "Dear Jeff, 

Thank you for taking the time to share such a detailed review of your stay with us. We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed your upgraded pool villa and appreciated the privacy, spaciousness, and amenities it provided. It's also wonderful to know that you found our team welcoming and the ambiance of our restaurant appealing.

We sincerely regret that the dining experience did not meet your expectations, especially the vegan options, and we appreciate your candid feedback. We'll review this with our culinary team to ensure improvements are made to better cater to all dietary preferences.

We understand the limitations you experienced with the setting of our property due to our proximity to the National Park. The safety and well-being of our guests, as well as the protection of wildlife, are paramount, which is why certain restrictions are in place. We apologize if this detracted from the enjoyment of your stay, and we recognize that this type of setting may not be ideal for all travelers.

We appreciate your valuable insights and will continue to work on enhancing the experience for our guests while balancing the unique environment we're situated in. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future with an improved experience.

Best Regards", 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-10-04', 'responder': None, 'connectionToSubject': None}
column6: {'id': '26194654', 'name': 'Hilton Yala Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 131, 'locationString': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.257097, 'longitude': 81.40043, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g3748686-d26194654-Reviews-Hilton_Yala_Resort-Palatupana_Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/kdwyahi-hilton-yala-resort/', 'address': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Palatupana', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '95000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 4, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 122}}
column12:
We stayed here for 4 nights after spending three weeks traveling around Sri Lanka.  Because we are Hilton members, we were upgraded to a pool villa, which was a delightful, spacious suite with a small pool and very nice outside sitting area.  There were plenty of electrical outlets and USB ports.  While these villas don‚Äôt have a view, we were nicely screened from neighboring villas, so it felt very private.  This suite was one of the best we have ever seen.

There is a nice view from the restaurant, and it has a pleasant atmosphere.  The servers are pleasant and attentive.  Unfortunately, the quality of the food was disappointing.  Possibly they do better with the meat dishes, but the vegan food did not live up to the very high prices charged.  We had far better food for a 1/4 of the price at a local restaurant we found 20 minutes away by car. 

It is also important to know that the hotel is in the national park‚Äôs buffer zone.  It‚Äôs great to be so close to the park, but that does limit the ability to enjoy the setting.  Because of the wild animals, we were only allowed to visit the beach area during the scheduled 1-hour Ranger Walks at 5 am and 5 pm ‚Äì and ocean swimming is not allowed.  After 6 pm, you cannot use the pool area and cannot walk between your room and the restaurant or spa; the hotel provides a buggy service instead.  You are not allowed to bring food to your room or eat in the sitting area outside your room.  

The pool has some nice sitting areas, but it is shallow and more of a wading pool than a swimming pool.  We didn‚Äôt use the pool or ever see anyone else using it.  

As already stated, the rooms here are great, and the grounds look beautiful.  Unfortunately, we didn‚Äôt enjoy ourselves as much as we expected.  The food was uninspired and overpriced.  We also felt trapped in our room because of the limitations on walking around and the lack of beach access.  After being visited by a large troop of aggressive monkeys, we didn‚Äôt even feel comfortable enjoying our outside plunge pool and seating area.  While it sounds romantic to be right on the ocean in a national park, and watching monkeys play is fun for awhile, the reality is that you can‚Äôt really enjoy the location.  If you tend to spend your hotel time inside, this may be a good choice for you.  Since we prefer to spend more time outside, it wasn‚Äôt a good choice for us.

column12:
Great location with excellent hospitality. Its my 2nd visit there because its an ideal place for a good holiday. Beautiful rooms with mind blowing interior. All the staff members were very friendly and looked into the needful throughout. 

There was a convenient buggy service to take you from the villas to the dining areas/lobby.

Maintenance staff always made sure our room was clean throughout the whole stay. The staff were extremely helpful and caring and went the extra mile to serve all our requests. 
A special mention about the food here, Food amazing All meals served were of top class Special thanks goes to mahesh and praveen who were really flexible with the meal plans we requested , 
Thank you Mahesh and pasan from front office and all the staff members . 
Lastly, the location was picturesque. The resort is in the middle of the forest containing flora and fauna.
We spent a very relaxing holiday there and thankyou so much. Till next time......
column13: A heaven in the middle of the Yala

column12: My wife and I came here for our anniversary and would give this resort 100 out of 100 stars if we could. Every aspect of this place is well thought out, and luxurious. The food is absolutely amazing and with executive chef Jerome the hilton truely has a super star. He absolutely goes above and beyond to make sure that not only the food is superb but you can tell that he truly cares about the general stay of every guest. We were so impressed by him and the rest of the staff at the resort. We saw monkey and peacocks around the area and took an afternoon safari to see elephants, leopards, crocodiles and many more cool animals. Would definitely come here again to recharge! column12:
As an experienced travel professional as well as a traveller being blessed with opportunties to experience ultra luxury , i must say that Hilton Yala Resort delivered awesome 5 star plus experience.  from the  arrival experience  , greetings at the entrance, check in , refreshing beverages etc was simply wow as we looked out side view of lush green and brilliant architecture that blended in to nature .

Highly reccomend for location, nature, friendly competant staff, and yes epicurean JHourneys each day tailor made to our dietary requests. culinary staff , felt like went above and beyound . in reality they were treating all guests woth same care and attention to details. 

The rooms are luxurious, very well appointed with amenties, and simply an indulgent feel.  bathrooms are some of the best designed . a must experience resort .
the spa offers many great treatments and a relaxing atomsphere.

All of these wonderful features and touches would not earn 5 star status in my book without the incredible hospitality extended by resort staff. From a country that gave the world the first woman Prime Minister in  democaractic country  have appointed an expert world class hotelier The General manager  Gitanjali Chakravarthy is one of the best professionals i have met in the hotel business .   

she has instrituted replicable eco friendly features including wooden room key cards and front desk staff politely retrives  prior to guest departure thus not only saving costs wise but also enviornmental point of view.   
Kudos to Githanjali and her staff for providing a memorable experience. YES will return
Thank you to the entire staff at Hilton Yala. as a diamond member This Hilton delivered one of the very best i have experienced .

column10: All the rooms are strategically located.
column12:
Without doubt , one of my best hotel stays in a very long time. My travel to Sri lanka with 4 more couples of my close friends started with the Hilton Yala and what a superb experience it was, in every aspect. From the moment we walked into the lobby of the  1 year old hotel premises, it gave all of us a feeling of hospitality that can only be expected from the Hilton chain. The hotel is one of around 7 hotel properties allowed to be built inside the Yala national Forest , and it was an experience of a lifetime for all of us. The room layout and amneties provided in the room, the private outdoor pool surrounded by the natural forest, with an expectation to see an elephant walk past by, the thrill of seeing a porcupine passing by the walkway to the hotel lobby, monkeys all running around the property without any real threat to any of the hotel guests was a real treat. The beach walk arranged and accompanied by the hotel ranger was a nice way to start the day , thought the beach is not suited for a swim due to the high waves but would recommend all the guests to do the walk during their stay.
The staff of the Hilton Yala were all very well trained and we were very impressed with their attentiveness and care as to all our concerns and questions. Special word of thanks to Dilasha and Bahsura at rhe front desk ,  Mr Prabuddha at the buggy service and Mr Adhil at the restaurant and F&B in charge. They were outstanding in their service and attitude. Mr Jerome , head chef was very attentive to our dietery needs and we really enjoyed his food expertise.
I would defintely suggest any one planning a travel to this beautiful country not to miss staying at the Yala Hilton.

column10: Safari Booking: Book your safari through the hotel‚Äôs concierge. They have good connections and can help arrange early morning trips
column12:
Location: Nestled near Yala National Park, the Hilton Yala offers a unique blend of luxury and nature. The proximity to the park is perfect for early morning safaris.

Accommodations: The rooms are spacious and well-designed, with stunning views of the surrounding landscapes. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and the bathroom was equipped with high-quality amenities.

Dining: The buffet breakfast was a highlight‚Äîdiverse options ranging from fresh fruit to a made-to-order omelet station. The dinner at the hotel‚Äôs restaurant was equally impressive, with a variety of local and international dishes.

Service: The staff were friendly and attentive. A special mention goes to Sachini, who truly made our stay exceptional. Her warmth, professionalism, and keen attention to detail stood out, making us feel truly valued as guests. Sachini is an asset to the team, and her dedication is evident in every interaction.

Pool Area: The pool area is visually appealing and well-maintained, offering a lovely spot to unwind. However, it does get quite busy, especially in the afternoon. If you prefer a quieter experience, consider visiting early in the morning or later in the evening. Additionally, the poolside seating could benefit from a few more loungers to accommodate all guests comfortably during peak times.
column13: "From Stunning Views to Exceptional Service: Hilton Yala Exceeds Expectations"

column5:
{'id': '967645282', 'text': "Dear Yns_10,

Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed experience at Hilton Yala. We‚Äôre delighted to hear that you chose to dine with us after your afternoon safari and that your visit turned into such a memorable part of your trip.

The welcome of cold towels after your safari is one of our signature touches, and we're glad it was appreciated. It‚Äôs wonderful to know that you enjoyed the cocktails in our lounge and that our team members were able to assist you with your safari disappointment by arranging a walking safari to the Sithulpawwa Rajamaha Viharaya Monastery. The sighting of such a variety of wildlife during your excursion sounds absolutely fantastic!

We‚Äôre pleased that you enjoyed your dining experience, particularly the sea bass in coconut cream, and that the service and ambience met your expectations. We do appreciate your feedback regarding the steak, and we will certainly take it into consideration for the future.

It‚Äôs heartening to hear that you had such an enriching experience during the walking safari, with our ranger providing insightful descriptions and making your adventure special. Watching an elephant peacefully in the wild is indeed a magical moment, and we're so happy that it was a highlight of your trip.

We‚Äôre thrilled that you ended your visit with a nostalgic club sandwich and that it was to your liking. We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back for an even longer stay with us next time!

Warm regards,", 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-08-31', 'responder': None, 'connectionToSubject': None}
column6: {'id': '26194654', 'name': 'Hilton Yala Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 131, 'locationString': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.257097, 'longitude': 81.40043, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g3748686-d26194654-Reviews-Hilton_Yala_Resort-Palatupana_Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/kdwyahi-hilton-yala-resort/', 'address': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Palatupana', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '95000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 4, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 122}}
column12: We had been so unimpressed by the dining options at our hotel that we decided to book dinner at the Hilton Resort Yala following our afternoon safari.  We arrived at this  fabulous resort and were greeted with cold towels which was so appreciated after the safari.  We started with some fabulous cocktails in the gorgeous lounge.  We were disappointed with our safari and so discussed options with the reception staff.  Moments later a ranger came to us and discussed the options that the hotel offers.  We were so impressed that we booked a walking safari to the Sithulpawwa Rajamaha Viharaya Monastery.  Then we headed to the restaurant.  One restaurant was closed but we were able to order from both the Dhira (Asian inspired) and Sandali (more western) menus.  I tried the sea bass in coconut cream, rice and manioc chips which was delicious.  One of us ordered the steak and that was the only slight disappointment - the quality of the steak was good for Sri Lanka but not up to what that Australian likes (who has lived in Sri Lanka for 7 years, so does know the issue with steak in the country). Service was great and engaging, the ambience is lovely.   We returned early the next morning for our walking safari.  We were driven along the edge of Yala and saw almost as much game (elephant, spotted deer, warthog, peacock, jungle fowl, water buffalo, crocodiles) on this drive as we did on our Yala safari yesterday!  We were mostly alone during our walk and the ranger was great, full of interesting descriptions and facts.  When we returned to the jeep we were given a breakfast box, fresh watermelon juice and water and spent a good ten minutes alone watching an elephant.  Fantastic excursion!  We returned to the Hilton near lunch time, so for nostalgic reasons had to have a club sandwich before returning to our hotel:  the club was excellent.  Next time we will stay here too!

column12:
Our stay at Hilton Yala was truly remarkable. From the moment we arrived, the staff‚Äôs hospitality stood out‚Äîthey were incredibly attentive and made every effort to ensure our experience was exceptional. The warm welcome, thoughtful details, and genuine care made us feel truly valued.

The hotel‚Äôs architecture, inspired by Jurassic Park, perfectly complements the stunning natural surroundings. The observation deck offers breathtaking views, making it an ideal spot to create lasting memories. The accommodations were luxurious, and the amenities provided a high level of comfort.

Dining at Hilton Yala was a highlight of our stay. The fusion cuisine was exquisite, and the unique cocktails added a special touch to our evenings. The breakfast spread was outstanding, offering a wide variety of delicious choices.

Hilton Yala exceeded our expectations in every way. With luxurious accommodations, outstanding service, and a dedicated staff, this is the perfect destination for anyone seeking a unique and memorable experience. We eagerly look forward to our next visit!

column12:
My family and I had the pleasure of staying at this incredibly beautiful hotel in the wildlife reserve in August 2024.
As a Gold Honors member, we were fortunate enough to be upgraded to a Premium Pool Villa, which turned out to be one of the best rooms we've ever experienced in Sri Lanka. From the moment we arrived, the reception, restaurant, and housekeeping staff treated us like true VIPs. The Front Office Manager Bhasura Rajapaksha was exceptionally helpful, ensuring all our needs were met.

A special mention goes to Chef Jerome Tissera, who personally checked in on us every time we dined at the restaurant, making our culinary experience even more memorable. The food was consistently excellent, and the entire staff demonstrated the utmost professionalism. Their impeccable service truly made us feel like VIPs throughout our stay.
column13: Exceptional VIP Experience at a Stunning Wildlife Reserve Hotel

column5:
{'id': '966429431', 'text': 'Dear Edin,

Thank you for sharing such an in-depth and thoughtful review of your stay at Hilton Yala. We are delighted that you found our property architecturally outstanding and that your villa, with its private pool and luxurious amenities, provided a truly special experience.

We are thrilled that you enjoyed the gourmet meals crafted by Chef Jerome. His passion for blending traditional Sri Lankan flavors with modern flair is something we take great pride in, and we‚Äôre glad it resonated with you. It‚Äôs wonderful to hear that you also enjoyed your private beach dinner‚Äîan exotic experience we strive to make unforgettable for our guests.

We appreciate your kind words about the design of the resort, which was intentionally crafted to blend seamlessly with its natural surroundings while offering a grand and elegant atmosphere. Your detailed description of the villa captures the essence of what we aim to provide‚Äîluxury intertwined with nature.

However, we are sorry to hear that certain aspects of your stay did not meet your expectations. We appreciate your feedback regarding the pricing and booking process for our experiences. While we aim to offer convenience and high-quality experiences, we understand your concerns about the advance payment requirement and will review this process to better align with guest expectations. Your comments about the front desk and check-in process have also been noted, and we will use this feedback to improve our service and training.

Regarding the restroom amenities, we apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. We agree that this does not meet the standards we strive to uphold, and we will address this with our team to ensure a more fitting solution is provided in the future.

Despite these concerns, we are pleased to know that you still consider our resort a very special place. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future, where we can provide an even more seamless and luxurious experience.

Warmest regards,', 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-08-23', 'responder': 'Vino Ramakrishnan', 'connectionToSubject': 'Guest Services / Front Office'}

column511: {'id': '26194654', 'name': 'Hilton Yala Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 131, 'locationString': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.257097, 'longitude': 81.40043, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g3748686-d26194654-Reviews-Hilton_Yala_Resort-Palatupana_Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/kdwyahi-hilton-yala-resort/', 'address': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Palatupana', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '95000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 4, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 122}}
column515: Book a private pool villa and book safaris through another vendor.
column517:
This is an architecturally outstanding property in the middle of Yala National Park.  I had a fully detached villa with a private pool and outdoor seating area.  The food was absolutely top notch and the staff was very friendly and helpful.  The location, while beautiful, was very remote and not accessible to anything else.  I stayed for two nights, but would have felt trapped had I stayed longer.  However, this may be due to my personal taste for less-relaxing more urban experiences.  

Firstly, the property is absolutely stunning.  It blends in perfectly with its landscape, and the entrance is deceivingly modest.  Once you walk through the enormous entrance door, however, the lobby and dining room are grand and the walls of glass highlight the amazing views of the resort and the Indian Ocean beyond.  Everything celebrates the natural world it inhabits.  It manages to be grand and elegant, but it still possesses a natural modesty at the same time; a difficult and nuanced combination.

My villa was stunning.  It was a fully detached house with a private entrance.  You enter into a foyer with a bench and space for muddy shoes, jackets, etc.  To the right is an office area with a large desk and lots of charging options.  To the left is a bar area with a mini fridge, coffee maker, tea kettle, etc.  Beyond the foyer is a king-sized bed and a wall of windows looking out onto my private patio and pool.  My villa was very private and looked directly into the dense jungle.  In front of the office area is a living room setup with a large television, coffee table, ottoman and couch.  To the left of the bed is a large walk ‚Äúthru‚Äù closet with plenty of storage space.  Walking through the closet brings you into the palatial bathroom with soaking tub, double-vanity, walk-in shower and w/c with a Japanese-style bidet. The bathroom was gorgeous and functioned very well.  

The deck and pool were absolutely luxurious.  How nice to end the day after a long, dusty safari with a dip in my private pool?  It truly doesn‚Äôt get much better than that.  

The food in the dining room was absolutely gourmet.  The chef - Jerome - takes time to visit with every guest.  His food is unique, gorgeous and absolutely delicious.  He manages to blend traditional Sri Lankan dishes and spices with modern flare and pulls it off perfectly.  I also booked a private grilled beach dinner.  Jerome and his staff served an incredible amount of food and supplied a most exotic beach dinner experience.  I loved it.  Unlike some other reviewers here, I actually found the prices pretty reasonable for this level of quality, environment and attention to detail. 

I have two issues regarding this beautiful Hilton resort‚Ä¶

1.) The prices of the ‚Äúexperiences‚Äù were unjustifiably exorbitant.  My initial inclination was to book our safari and other activities through the hotel.  I did not mind paying more for the convenience of booking directly through the hotel.  However, when I tried to book through the hotel I was told I would need to pay for the experiences at the time of booking as opposed to being able to add it to my hotel bill.  Considering that the cost of the safari was more than double what I eventually paid through a third-party vendor, I expected one of the benefits would be not having to pay in advance.  The hotel emailed me an explanation that I found quite lame regarding the quality of their experiences and that the lack of availability requires them to charge in advance.  I ended up booking my safari through Ajith‚Äôs Safari through Viator and I did not have to pay in advance.  My afternoon safari cost $78 and was spectacular.  I saw 2 leopards, an elephant extremely close-up, monkeys, water buffalo, wild bores, crocodiles, and many, many more.  My driver Laksha was very good and used his good relations with other drivers to get us to the best sightings quickly.  This was a terrific value and wonderful experience.

2.)  The staff at the front desk need a little more training.  Our check in experience was a bit chaotic and took too long,  Additionally. because I paid for the second night using Hilton points, I had to check out and check back in on day two.  There has to be a better way to handle that, no?  Also, used the rest room in the lobby while waiting to check in.  Manager: please recognize that tissues are not a suitable substitute for paper towels or hand towels.  In a hotel of this caliber I would expect to find terry hand towels in the restroom. but the only way to dry one‚Äôs hands here was to use the box of tissues on the sink counter.  Yuck. 

Other than those two fairly minor complaints, this is a very special resort.  Book a villa with a private pool and revel in the luxurious experience.
column518: Beautifully designed resort in the middle of Yala National Park

column5:
{'id': '966342093', 'text': 'Dear Isshani,

Thank you so much for sharing your wonderful experience with us! We are delighted to hear that you had a lovely and relaxing holiday at our resort. Your kind words about our staff and food are greatly appreciated, and we are thrilled to know that you enjoyed every aspect of your stay.

We are especially glad that your safari experience with Ranger Sanka was memorable. It‚Äôs heartwarming to hear that he was able to make the safari engaging and enjoyable for the kids, and that you had the chance to see so many incredible animals, including the leopards. We will be sure to pass along your compliments to both Sanka and our safari jeep driver, who will be pleased to know that their efforts made your journey both safe and exciting.

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us, and for your glowing review. We truly enjoyed hosting your family and look forward to welcoming you back for another unforgettable stay in the future.

column12: The staff was excellent and so was the food! It was a lovely relaxing holiday. Special mention about our ranger Sanka. He was amazing and we saw lots of animals including leopards, he was explaining and interacting with the kids and made sure the kids had a lovely safari ride. The safari jeep driver was also very good and safe, extra careful as we were travelling with kids. Overall we really enjoyed our stay and hope to be back!

column5:

column6: {'id': '26194654', 'name': 'Hilton Yala Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 131, 'locationString': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.257097, 'longitude': 81.40043, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g3748686-d26194654-Reviews-Hilton_Yala_Resort-Palatupana_Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/kdwyahi-hilton-yala-resort/', 'address': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Palatupana', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '95000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 4, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 122}}
column12:
It was such a lovely experience to stay at Yala Hilton. We stayed there for two nights last week. the moment we arrived the resort, we immediately felt it‚Äôs gonna be a great adventure. 
The resort was inspired by Jurassic world. It truly makes you feel that you are in a remote/wild life. 

The hotel staff at front desk were super nice and welcoming. Our room was spotless and modern. One night after dinner on our way back to the room, we bumped into a porcupine strolling in the resort. How wild!! My kids loved it so much. 

Big thanks to our arranger- Pasi, he booked our tickets a night before in order for us to skip the line to enter the park. He knows the Yala national park really well, he and the driver worked perfectly together, they were quick and efficient. Therefore, our family got the best views of all the animals that we desired to see. Pasi was really patient and fun. My two young kids had a great time with him. My husband and I even went twice safari with him, we liked his knowledge of wild animals. To go on safari with him was truly a highlight of our stay. 

Also, a special thanks to restaurant staff-Manohari and Proven, they were amazing!! They accommodated and specialized our meals, my kids ate really well at the hotel, so did my husband and I. 

Overall, the staff at Yala were all really nice and professional, this hotel is an absolute hidden gem in Yala national park. We highly recommend to all guests, and for sure we would love to visit again in the future.

column5:

column12:
We stayed at this beautiful hotel, it was such a treat!  The staff are amazing and do anything to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable.  Jerome the head chef and his team were fabulous, he accommodated us for our whole stay, checking in with us when he could.  Having fussy eaters was considered too!

Sankar our safari ranger was amazing, he was able to bring us close to the animals, he is so energetic and works with great enthusiasm. His knowledge about the animals was the best!   He also gave an us an induction for rules of safety on the resort‚Ä¶just as well‚Ä¶we had a large crocodile visit us and monkeys on the balcony too!

Staff in reception, housekeeping, buggy drivers and waiters all played a part in making our stay memorable.

Overall the accommodation is clean and welcoming as soon as you park up!  

Thank you for making our stay special and celebrating milestones with us.
column13: Amazing hotel and staff! Lots of memories ü©∑

column12: Te hotel structure and staff are amazing! Me and my wife had a wonderful experience, the meals were the best we had in Sri Lanka, the chef does a great job, our waiter was also very polite and nice. The safari was unforgettable, our ranger Sanka is full of knowledge about the wild life and a lot of experience in the area.  Highly recommend the hotel, the room is also amazing!

column5:
{'id': '966343081', 'text': 'Dear Alexander,

Thank you for sharing such a beautifully crafted review of your stay at Hilton Yala! We are absolutely delighted that our resort offered you a unique and tranquil escape from the fast-paced world.

Your kind words about our private villas, impeccable service, and luxurious amenities truly capture the essence of what we strive to offer our guests. Chef Jerome and his culinary team will be thrilled to know that their gourmet creations made your experience even more memorable.

We‚Äôre especially pleased that our ranger team contributed to making your safari experience feel like a fairy tale. Their deep knowledge and passion for the wildlife and natural surroundings are indeed something special.

It‚Äôs wonderful to hear that you appreciated the peaceful environment within the sanctuary. The chance to observe elephants or even a glimpse of a leopard near the terrace is a rare and magical experience, and we‚Äôre glad you had the opportunity to enjoy it.

We understand that our resort might not be for everyone, but we‚Äôre so happy that it was the perfect place for you. Your thoughtful recommendation means a great deal to us, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for another serene getaway in the future.

Warmest regards,', 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-08-23', 'responder': 'Vino Ramakrishnan', 'connectionToSubject': 'Guest Services / Front Office'}
column6: {'id': '26194654', 'name': 'Hilton Yala Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 131, 'locationString': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.257097, 'longitude': 81.40043, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g3748686-d26194654-Reviews-Hilton_Yala_Resort-Palatupana_Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/kdwyahi-hilton-yala-resort/', 'address': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Palatupana', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '95000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 4, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 122}}
column12:
This stunning boutique hotel is not for the average traveler. Trust me, I have nothing against FB or beach/pool burnouts and late night karaoke, but this is something else. 

Amazing fully equipped private villas inside the national park, quiet, impeccable service from moment you step in, luxurious amenities and delicious gourmet food from Chef Jerome. A special mention to the ranger team, whose knowledge, experience and care during the safari made our trip a fairy tale. 

This place is perfect for taking a break from the fast-paced world. And don't worry, there's great WiFi so you'll always be connected. But more properly, treat yourself to a good book or two! 

Since the hotel is situated within a sanctuary, you must adhere to a few simple rules. However, if you are fortunate, you might have the chance to observe elephants drinking from a pond near the terrace. I've also heard tales of leopards emerging from the jungle. ;)

You may think that I am too impressionable and my post contradicts others. I guess it was just not their place or the stars were in the wrong position those days ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
column13: An experience that will blow your mind (and heart)

column5:
{'id': '959449546', 'text': 'Dear Binuki,

Thank you for sharing your feedback following your recent stay at Hilton Yala Resort. We sincerely apologize for the issues you encountered and the disappointment you felt during your visit.

Regarding the welcome experience, our records indicate that the reservation was made for four adults, and the welcome amenities, including face towels, were prepared accordingly. We regret any inconvenience caused by this oversight.

Our lobby is infused with our signature Hilton Yala essence, designed to provide a unique and pleasant ambiance. We are sorry that it did not meet your expectations.

We take your feedback about the food quality very seriously. Our executive sous chef and the F&B manager spoke to your group during lunch, offering replacement food items and dishes outside our menu to accommodate your preferences. At dinner, our F&B manager again assisted your group with choices. Finally, at check-out, our Front Office Manager spoke to your group, and it was during this conversation that the gentleman in your group aggressively raised his voice, leading us to discontinue the discussion professionally.

We apologize if the western menu items did not meet your tastes, though we are glad to hear that the Sri Lankan Kottu Roti was a delight.

Lastly, we did offer a takeaway breakfast to ensure your departure was as smooth as possible given the circumstances.

We did try our best to meet your expectations in every way and are disappointed that we could not meet them. We treat all our guests with utmost professionalism, and our TripAdvisor reviews received to date contradict your experience at Hilton Yala.

Warm regards,', 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-07-14', 'responder': 'Vino Ramakrishnan', 'connectionToSubject': 'Guest Services / Front Office'}
column6: {'id': '26194654', 'name': 'Hilton Yala Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 131, 'locationString': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.257097, 'longitude': 81.40043, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g3748686-d26194654-Reviews-Hilton_Yala_Resort-Palatupana_Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/kdwyahi-hilton-yala-resort/', 'address': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Palatupana', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '95000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 4, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 122}}
column12: Our stay at the Hilton Yala Resort was a huge disappointment. From the moment we arrived, the lack of a proper welcome was noticeable. With six of us, only four face towels were provided, leaving two of us waiting. The reception area had an unpleasant smell, which added to the disappointing start. Lunch was a disaster; not a single dish was palatable. Even after informing the waitress, the food quality did not improve. The glasses provided for water had a very unpleasant smell, and the replacements were just as bad. During dinner, an iced mocha was watery, and the replacement was equally terrible. Dinner was a nightmare, even worse than lunch. The staff's mocking attitude towards our complaints was unprofessional, and the absence of managerial intervention was a letdown. We left without having breakfast, utterly dissatisfied. I strongly advise against choosing this hotel for your stay. It is truly disappointing to receive such poor service from a Hilton property. The property itself is beautiful, but the staff needs better training, and the food quality must be significantly improved to match the property‚Äôs potential.

column5:
{'id': '959442535', 'text': 'Dear Rishini,

Thank you for sharing your wonderful review of Hilton Yala Resort. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found it to be a unique and luxurious experience, especially being situated on the edge of a wildlife reserve.

We‚Äôre thrilled that you loved your spacious pool villa with the saltwater plunge pool. It‚Äôs also fantastic to know that you found our food offerings memorable, with a mix of fine dining dishes and tasty options, as well as our innovative cocktails and mocktails.

Although luck was not on your side to spot elephants or leopards, we hope the sighting of rabbits and a peacock added a touch of wildlife magic to your stay. The elephant corridor is indeed a special feature of our property, and sightings are often a matter of chance.

We appreciate your positive comments about the accessibility of our resort, highlighting the excellent condition of the roads up to the hotel and the easily motorable dirt road for the last 700 meters. The charm of reaching our "middle of nowhere" paradise within a 3.5 to 4-hour drive from Colombo is something many guests value.

Thank you once again for your kind words. We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay at Hilton Yala Resort.

Warm regards,', 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-07-14', 'responder': 'Vino Ramakrishnan', 'connectionToSubject': 'Guest Services / Front Office'}
column6: {'id': '26194654', 'name': 'Hilton Yala Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 131, 'locationString': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.257097, 'longitude': 81.40043, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g3748686-d26194654-Reviews-Hilton_Yala_Resort-Palatupana_Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/kdwyahi-hilton-yala-resort/', 'address': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Palatupana', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '95000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 4, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 122}}
column12:
Loved everything about it. It was quite a different experience. We've done glamping before. But this was something else. It was a luxury hotel in every sense of the word, but at the edge of a wildlife reserve!

We got a pool villa. It was spacious, had a lovely saltwater plunge pool. In terms of food, there were some top notch fine dining level dishes, some were not exactly 'fine dining' but still tasty. There were also some innovative cocktails and mocktails. Overall the food was quite memorable. 

We were told there was an elephant corridor through the property and if we are lucky we would get to see elephants and even leopards.... but luck was not on our side as saw only two rabbits and a peacock :) 

Also, another major plus point is that the roads are in excellent condition almost up to the hotel and even the dirt road of the last 700 meters is easily motorable. The fact that you can get to this "in the middle of nowhere place" in 3.30 - 4 hours from Colombo adds to the charm of the place.

column5:
{'id': '958258820', 'text': 'Dear Ayesha,

Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We sincerely apologize that certain aspects of your experience did not meet your expectations. We also appreciate your positive remarks about our rooms and the top-notch service provided by our staff.

I would like to clarify that our second restaurant is not closed due to low occupancy. Rather, we have decided to offer the same menu at our all-day dining restaurant due to the high temperature and humidity, ensuring a more comfortable dining experience for our guests.

Our pricing for activities such as safaris and bush walks reflects the unique and enriching experiences we provide. These activities are conducted by our FGASA-qualified rangers, who offer exceptional and informative journeys through the natural beauty of our surroundings. Numerous positive reviews attest to the value of these experiences.

Given our location within a national park, we are subject to restrictions on entertainment to preserve the natural environment and ensure the safety of our guests and wildlife. As your safety is our utmost priority, we accompany guests to the beach to ensure a secure and enjoyable visit.

We appreciate your understanding and thank you for your valuable feedback. Should you have any further concerns or questions, please feel free to reach out to us directly.

Best regards,', 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-07-06', 'responder': 'Vino Ramakrishnan', 'connectionToSubject': 'Guest Services / Front Office'}

column12: I had high expectations for this place and my stay did not live up to them. Although the room was great and the service provided by staff was top notch, the hotel didn't really offer anything to justify the price tag, its second restaurant was closed due to low occupancy so guests only had access to one restaurant and the activities offered by the hotel i.e safari and bush walks were massively overpriced. There's not much going on in the hotel in the evenings by way of entertainment and the beach is not accessible privately.

column5:
{'id': '959442381', 'text': 'Dear Samanthi,

Thank you for your glowing review and for sharing your wonderful experience at Hilton Yala Resort. We are thrilled to hear that we exceeded your expectations with our impeccable services and luxurious amenities. Our proximity to the beach, which you described as pure magic, is indeed one of the highlights of our resort.

Chef Jerome and Shanuka are delighted to know that you enjoyed their culinary masterpieces. They truly appreciate your kind words and are always happy to go above and beyond to provide authentic Sri Lankan hospitality.

We are also glad that you had an unforgettable experience with our Ranger, Sanka. His passion and knowledge of the natural world make every excursion special, and it‚Äôs wonderful to hear that you connected with nature on a deeper level during your time with him.

Manohari and our entire team are grateful for your recognition of their attentive service, and I am personally honored by your kind mention. It is our mission to make every guest‚Äôs stay extraordinary, and we are pleased to have contributed to your remarkable Sri Lankan vacation.

Thank you once again for your heartfelt feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back to our paradise at Hilton Yala Resort.

Warm regards,', 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-07-14', 'responder': 'Vino Ramakrishnan', 'connectionToSubject': 'Guest Services / Front Office'}
column6: {'id': '26194654', 'name': 'Hilton Yala Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 131, 'locationString': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.257097, 'longitude': 81.40043, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g3748686-d26194654-Reviews-Hilton_Yala_Resort-Palatupana_Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/kdwyahi-hilton-yala-resort/', 'address': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Palatupana', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '95000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 4, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 122}}
column12:
The Hilton Yala Resort in Sri Lanka in one of the best Hilton resorts exceeded all expectations. Impeccable services, luxurious amenities, and the beach (2 min away) is pure magic. 
Executive Chef Jerome and Shanuka, your dishes are culinary masterpiece. Thank you very much for your genuine care, going above and beyond and even making the dishes outside of the menu ‚Äì authentic Sri Lankan hospitality.
Naturalist, Sanka‚Äôs took me to all the magical places in Yala. His true passion and knowledge on plants, birds and the wild helped to build joyful connection to the nature in a deeper level. Thank you very much for the unforgettable experiences with breathtaking sunrises, elephant gathering and beautiful Yala.  
Manohari and the staff, your attentive service made my vacation delightful. 
General Manager-Gitanjali not only made my Yala vacation extraordinary, but she also even made arrangements to other destinations in my Sri Lanka travel to make my vacation remarkable.  No double where the Yala Hilton staff inherits the passion and care. You have built a paradise. Thank you very much for everything!

column5:

column12:
I recently stayed at the Yala Resort in Sri Lanka for two nights at the end of March, and I was thoroughly impressed. Every employee was truly amazing‚Äîattentive, welcoming, and incredibly helpful. This resort is a must-visit, especially for those seeking a very relaxing place. My Sri Lanka trip was very adventurous in the beginning and at the end i took had a relaxing time here in the Resort.

The Balcony Room is amazing, offering stunning views and comfort. Tastefully designed. The foods & drinks are exceptionally tasteful, and all the facilities are great. I highly recommend the Yala Resort for a memorable and relaxing getaway!

column5:
{'id': '957323268', 'text': "Dear Firemedic110,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful review of our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and appreciated our Jurassic Park theme, which we designed to help guests connect with nature while enjoying our many amenities.

We are delighted that you found our team to be friendly and attentive, and that you enjoyed our gym, spa, and sauna. It's great to hear that you found our pool to be clean, comfortable, and large, and that you had an excellent dining experience at our restaurant.

We appreciate your feedback regarding the bar service and are glad that you found the drinks well made and tasty. We will work on improving the wait times to enhance your experience further.

We are also pleased that you enjoyed the convenience of our buggy service. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us.

We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay.

Bring small cash tips. 
Bring swimwear to enjoy the pool. 
They provide plenty of water.
Enjoy Nespresso Virtuoso pod coffee in the room.
column12: A beautiful new hotel with a Jurassic Park theme to help you connect with nature while enjoying their many amenities. The staff are very friendly and attentive. Their nice gym and spa also provide access to a sauna. The pool is clean and very comfortable and large. The restaurant is top notch with great food and service. Drinks from the bar require some patience, but they are well made and tasty. They provide a complimentary buggy (golf cart) service from your room to the different areas. Such a nice hotel!

column5:
{'id': '956642840', 'text': "Dear Irfan,

Thank you for sharing your detailed and thoughtful review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Hilton Yala and that many aspects of our service and amenities exceeded your expectations.

It's wonderful to know that you found our hotel entrance luxurious and the view a treat for the eyes. We are pleased that the check-in process was smooth and our reception team made you feel welcome. Our Ranger and buggy drivers will be happy to hear your kind words about their assistance and punctuality.

We are delighted that you enjoyed your dinner service, and Hasnini will be recognized for her excellent work. However, we apologize that the breakfast service did not meet your expectations and appreciate your feedback. We will address this with our team to ensure improvements are made.

We are glad that you found your premium pool villa spacious and exceptionally clean. It's fantastic to hear that your kids had a great time as well.

We look forward to welcoming you back for another wonderful stay. Thank you once again for choosing Hilton Yala.

Warm regards", 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-06-25', 'responder': 'Vino Ramakrishnan', 'connectionToSubject': 'Guest Services / Front Office'}

column10: The road to the hotel was bumpy..
column12: The Hotel entrance itself was very luxury & view point was a treat to the eyes.Checking was very smooth,everybody in the reception was friendly.the Ranger assisted us for walks around the resort and he made sure our safety.the buggy were on time also the buggy drivers were extremely helpful and on time pick up & had a smiling face all the time.dinner service at the restaurant was excellent and Hasnini did a wonderful job.however the service at breakfast did not meet our expectations.the room was very spacious it look almost new.our room category was premium pool villa,the room was exceptionally clean.My kids enjoyed alot very will visit again‚Ä¶thank you Hilton Yala resort ‚ù§Ô∏è

column12:
Please don‚Äôt hesitate if you are deciding on whether you should book a stay in this hotel or not. This hotel is simply amazing, from the staff to the facilities to views and amenities it was an altogether wonderful experience! 

My wife and I were treated with great hospitality and care by this amazing team of staff. Special thanks go out to Adhil who was our assigned waiter throughout our stay, executive chef Jerome who cooked the most amazing food we had in our stay and Sanka who was our assigned ranger on our safari drive through Yala National Park! 

We will definitely recommend this beautiful hotel to anyone visiting Sri Lanka who is looking for an altogether great experience and we can‚Äôt wait to come back again soon!

Hammed and Khadija!

I had the pleasure of staying at the Hilton Yala, and I must say that the experience was very good, mainly due to the outstanding service provided by the General Manager Mrs Geethanjali and the Executive Chef Mr Jerome. 

From the moment we arrived, the  Mrs Geethanjali went  beyond to ensure our stay was comfortable and memorable. Her attention to detail and willingness to accommodate our every need was truly impressive.

column12: One of the greatest hotels we've stayed in. Amazing property and even more amazing staff. Starting with the reception team that welcomed us, the restaurant staff with the ever so pleasant Hashini, who was incredible our whole stay. The the Executive Chef, Jerome. Every single dish that was served, was just amazing and better than most Michelin Star restaurants that I've been to and was just a great host, who tried his very best to look out for my family and my needs. A special mention to our wonderful Ranger Sanka who made the trip even more memorable for us, especially our kids and the whole wonderful team of this amazing resort. This was one of best if not the best trips we've had and Hiton Yala and their amazing staff were the reason. I cannot wait to go back and cannot recommend this place enough. Thank you, thank you, thank you!!

column5:
{'id': '956639040', 'text': "Dear Rohini,

Thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled to hear about your delightful experience at our hotel. Your detailed feedback is incredibly heartwarming and serves as a great testament to our commitment to providing exceptional service and memorable experiences.

column12:
I can‚Äôt say enough about the hotel.. where does one begin..hmm.. the design is beautiful.. along the lines of Jurassic park‚Äî high walls, all the feels..
The staff is fantastic‚Äî efficient warm welcoming ..
The hotel amenities are fantastic.. pool and spa just fab.. 
when it comes to the food .. I have never ever looked forward to food in hotels more than I have during the course of our stay. Each and every meal was a just üòãüòãüòãwell thought out, perfect proportions , and brilliant to taste.. soul satisfying u could say. They even went out of their way to make special meals at our request for both kids .
Chef Jerome,his jr chefs n staff are so good, words are not enough.
I think the food really made our stay , not discounting that the hotel is as luxurious as it could possibly get ,without being OTT in the same breath
Our naturalist pazi was extremely well informed and very thoughtful regarding the kids.. had lovely picnic baskets packed for them on both days and went out of his way to show us everything. 
Loved our stay here n will definitely come back MINUS the kids üòÑ
Oooh I also must mention the ice lollies they gave the kids on arrival (and there after many times during our stayüòÖüòÖ) they are super.. refreshing n delicious..
üôèüèªüôèüèª

column5:
{'id': '955434614', 'text': "Dear JandNMc,

Thank you so much for your glowing review! We are thrilled to hear that your stay at Hilton Yala Resort was an unforgettable experience.

We‚Äôre glad that your safari experience with Ranger Saj was memorable, and that you got to see the elephants and learn about the rich history of Yala. Saj and his team will be delighted to hear your feedback.

Vinuli and the team will be thrilled to know that their surprise birthday cake made your celebration special. It‚Äôs the little touches that we believe make a stay truly memorable.

We are so pleased to hear that you plan to return to Sri Lanka and stay with us again. We look forward to welcoming you back and providing you with more fantastic hospitality. Thank you once again for your kind words.

column6: {'id': '26194654', 'name': 'Hilton Yala Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 131, 'locationString': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.257097, 'longitude': 81.40043, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g3748686-d26194654-Reviews-Hilton_Yala_Resort-Palatupana_Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/kdwyahi-hilton-yala-resort/', 'address': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Palatupana', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '95000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 4, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 122}}
column10: Dont come just for a night and one safari experience. Stay a 3 0r 4 nights and do a couple of the experiences. You will not regret it
column12:
If you are reading the reviews trying to decide whether to book a stay at Hilton Yala don't hesitate, book now. This hotel is so much more than a stepping stone to the National Park, it's a destination in itself. From the moment you arrive you until you leave, you are immersed in a cocoon of luxury. Each and every member of staff are there to ensure you have the best stay. The thought, care and belief in the hotel shines through. 

Our pool villa was perfect. Comfortable bed,  luxurious bathroom and a welcoming pool. The house keeping team were brilliant.

The food was especially delicious. Chef Jerome's ethos is produce dishes with amazing twists, using locally sourced ingredients. In short, the food is an extension of the hotel. All dietary needs are taken care of. Nothing is too much trouble. Breakfast was plentiful and made to order. We especially enjoyed the Sri Lankan fare. 

The hotel as an on-site Ranger team headed by Saj. We were fortunate enough to be guided through the park by him. I love elephants and Saj made sure I got to see them. An unforgettable experience for me. Whilst seeing the animals is important, we found learning about the history of Yala through the wildlife, flora and fauna truly enriched our experience and thank Saj for all his expertise.

During our stay I celebrated my birthday. Vinuli noticed on check in and organized   a surprise birthday cake for me. This kind gesture shows the level of attention shown at the Hilton Yala.

We plan to return to Sri Lanka again. The wonderful team at the Hilton Yala have made it impossible not to return to this hotel again. We look forward to their fantastic hospitality. Thank you all.

column5:

It‚Äôs fantastic to hear that you loved our food offerings, especially the local Sri Lankan cuisine and the crab dishes. We‚Äôre proud of our culinary team for creating such a variety of delicious options.

Your story about how the team noticed and responded to your unwellness truly warms our hearts. It‚Äôs these personal touches that we believe make a stay great, and we‚Äôre happy to know it made a difference for you.

column6: {'id': '26194654', 'name': 'Hilton Yala Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 131, 'locationString': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.257097, 'longitude': 81.40043, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g3748686-d26194654-Reviews-Hilton_Yala_Resort-Palatupana_Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/kdwyahi-hilton-yala-resort/', 'address': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Palatupana', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '95000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 4, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 122}}
column12:
From the time we stepped off our car to the time we got back to leave the resort we were treated so well by Gitanjali and her team. The team at Hilton Yala sets them apart from the rest of the with their genuine and caring hospitality, who always went above and beyond to take care of our needs during the stay.

The resort is located at a very beautiful location and make you feel one with the nature during the stay. Very peaceful and quiet location ideal to relax and distance yourself with the busy city lives. For anyone staying here a safari is a must do activity, and the rangers they have are very knowledgeable and will make sure to give you the best experience during the safari. Sameera who was our ranger was amazing and would not hesitate to request him again when we visit here again.

Location and hospitality aside, the food here is fantastic. With a variety of options available you will never run out of different menu items to try during a stay. Local Sri Lankan cuisine is something that everyone should try from here. They have some of the best crab dishes that you can get in Sri Lanka. We would go back to Hilton Yala again just for the food alone.

During my stay I was not feeling too well one day towards the evening and the staff noticed this and inquired if anything was required. Not only that the next day from the buggy driver, the kitchen team, and the team at the reception inquired if I was feeling okay, and if anything was required to make sure that I was doing well.  It is these little things that the team does that make a good stay great.

For anyone looking to disengage from the busy life and relax for a few days Hilton Yala is one of the best places to go, and we highly recommend this to anyone. Go and enjoy the beauty, delicious food, and the amazing hospitality that Hilton Yala has to offer.

column10: Be aware of the elephants and other wild animals along the road to the hotel if you are traveling late night or early morning
column12:
Just got back from the Hilton Yala Resort, and wow, what a place! We got there super early for our safari, like 5 AM early, and they already had snacks, tea, and coffee waiting for us. Talk about service!

The safari was awesome. Our ranger, Pasindu, knew everything about Yala and the animals. We even got a yummy bento box with fresh juice to take with us, which was a nice touch.

When we got back, our room was already ready, even though check-in wasn't for hours. As Hilton Honors members, we felt like VIPs.

Big shoutout to Geethanji and the whole crew for making our stay so awesome. Manohari took such good care of us, and Chef Shakir's food was out of this world!

Honestly, this is one of the best resorts we've ever stayed at. It's fancy but still super friendly and welcoming. We totally recommend it and can't wait to go back for a longer stay!

{'id': '951080948', 'text': "Dear Rares,

Thank you immensely for your heartfelt review following your recent 4-night stay with us. We are absolutely thrilled to read your kind words and to learn that your experience exceeded your expectations in every way.

It warms our hearts to hear that you found our team to be simply beautiful and that you enjoyed the culinary delights prepared by our chefs. Our aim is always to go above and beyond for our guests, and we're delighted to hear that our efforts were appreciated.

We're thrilled that you found the quality of our villas to be top-notch and that you enjoyed the luxury of having both a private heated pool and access to our expansive main pool. It sounds like you made the most of your time with us!

We're particularly delighted to hear about your family's safari experiences and the special connection your children formed with our ranger, Sanka. We'll be sure to pass along your kind words to him, and we commend him for his dedication to sharing his passion for wildlife with your family.

Thank you for recommending us so highly. We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you and your family back for another unforgettable stay in the future.

column6: {'id': '26194654', 'name': 'Hilton Yala Resort', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 131, 'locationString': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.257097, 'longitude': 81.40043, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g3748686-d26194654-Reviews-Hilton_Yala_Resort-Palatupana_Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/kdwyahi-hilton-yala-resort/', 'address': 'Palatupana, Yala National Park 95000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': 'Palatupana', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '95000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 4, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 2, 'count4': 3, 'count5': 122}}
column12:
My family and I have just checked out after a 4 nights stay and I can hardly find the correct words to describe how beautiful this place was. The people working in this hotel are simply beautiful, the food is more than you could‚Äôve ever expected (they will do anything for you, just ask for), the quality of the villa is top class. Each villa comes with a heated pool + the main pool which is huge and heated, too. 
We were on two different safaris and our kids simply loved it. We cannot find enough words to thank our ranger, Sanka @rangerbyaccident (follow him on IG), who did everything possible to entertain, but more important, to teach my son and my daughter the secrets of wildlife. Every morning he took my 6 yo son for a short adventure walk, teaching and showing him different footprints, chasing wild buffaloes, crocodiles or elephants. A man fully dedicated to the wild. He didn‚Äôt teach them algebra or science, but he taught them life. Couldn‚Äôt be more grateful and thankful for this experience!
A place I would highly recommend!
column13: A place I would certainly recommend!

It brings us immense joy to learn that you found our resort, including the hotel, restaurant, pool, and all common areas, to be of top-notch quality. We take great pride in offering our guests a luxurious and immersive experience surrounded by the natural beauty of the region. Your appreciation of our dedicated staff members is truly gratifying, as they are committed to providing exceptional service to ensure our guests' satisfaction.

Thank you once again for choosing Hilton Yala Resort for your vacation, and we are honored to have been a part of your unforgettable journey. We eagerly await the opportunity to welcome you back for another exceptional stay in the future.

column12: A spectacular new (October 2023) resort within the wildlife buffer zone of Yala National Park. The hotel, restaurant, pool, all common areas and especially the villa are all top notch, as are all staff members we encountered. My wife and I spent a fabulous 5 nights at the Hilton Yala Resort. The resort's own ranger assigned to us was very knowledgeable and friendly, making nature walks, safari in Yala and snorkeling at Great Basses Reef extra special. An unforgettable vacation!
column13: An outstanding resort for unforgettable days surrounded by nature.

column6: {'id': '630497', 'name': 'Kulu Safaris Sri Lanka', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 422, 'locationString': 'Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.390171, 'longitude': 81.373665, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g612381-d630497-Reviews-Kulu_Safaris_Sri_Lanka-Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'http://www.kulusafaris.com/', 'address': 'Yala National Park Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': None, 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': ''}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 1, 'count4': 18, 'count5': 397}}
column12: We absolutely loved staying here. It was a very special part of our holiday. The tents were brilliant, fully kitted out and very comfortable. The location was beautiful. The hospitality is second to none, every detail has been considered! Our guides Pramoth and Ajith were brilliant, so knowable and kind. They did a wonderful job of finding us some amazing animals without getting too close and disturbing them. We got some wonderful opportunities for photographs. They also took us on a  great walk up a nearby hill which gave such a fab view. The food was excellent, the best we‚Äôve had on our holiday. Cannot recommend this place enough. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

column6: {'id': '630497', 'name': 'Kulu Safaris Sri Lanka', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 422, 'locationString': 'Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.390171, 'longitude': 81.373665, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g612381-d630497-Reviews-Kulu_Safaris_Sri_Lanka-Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'http://www.kulusafaris.com/', 'address': 'Yala National Park Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': None, 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': ''}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 1, 'count4': 18, 'count5': 397}}
column12: We had an amazing experience and stay with Kulu Safaris. The food is the best in Sri Lanka. Every meal is home cooked and set in the most romantic settings. Ajith and Praba are so knowledgeable.  We learned so much about Sri Lanka, its history, and its natural habitat. They made certain we found the big 5 on our safari, and they did not disappoint. We couldn‚Äôt recommend Kulu enough!
column13: The best experience in Sri Lanka

column6: {'id': '630497', 'name': 'Kulu Safaris Sri Lanka', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 422, 'locationString': 'Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.390171, 'longitude': 81.373665, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g612381-d630497-Reviews-Kulu_Safaris_Sri_Lanka-Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'http://www.kulusafaris.com/', 'address': 'Yala National Park Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': None, 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': ''}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 1, 'count4': 18, 'count5': 397}}
column10: Stay 2 nights minimum !
column12:
Spent the most magical few days with Kulu Safaris in Yala National Park. I cannot recommend this amazing team and experience enough! If you do want to have the most authentic wildlife experience in Sri Lanka you need to stay at KULU Safaris. The team are like a family unit who will take care of you from the time you meet them close to camp till your dropped back. 

Nothing is too much trouble and the staff and service is another level. Naturalist and guide Jeana will ensure you have the best wildlife experience while on safari and also when your hiking, and doing jungle walks. Ajith and team are some of the best safari jeep guides in the country. So try to book a minimum of 2 nights to get the best experience of the camp and the wildlife. 

Thank you Kulu Team for a memorable stay and hope to be back soon!
column13: A magical stay at Yala with KULU Safaris - Yala, Sri Lanka

column6: {'id': '630497', 'name': 'Kulu Safaris Sri Lanka', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 422, 'locationString': 'Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.390171, 'longitude': 81.373665, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g612381-d630497-Reviews-Kulu_Safaris_Sri_Lanka-Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'http://www.kulusafaris.com/', 'address': 'Yala National Park Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': None, 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': ''}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 1, 'count4': 18, 'count5': 397}}
column10: We stayed during dry and Low season. Both has its plus and minuses.
column12: We came to Kulusafari in the dry season (not intentional) but from the time we reached at the camp the Kulusafari team made our stay really special. The food was delectable our family tent nice and clean (keep in mind this is inside the jungle you are bound to see insects etc.) Special thanks to ‚ÄòKois and Wimale‚Äô and rest of the team. I recommend this  place hands down. Lots of little personal touches here and there from the crew made it special. The safari ride was a success with 2 leopard sightings. They tracked the big cat with expertise without being aggressive. We are looking forward for another stay.
column13: Sri Lankan Hospitality at the best

column6: {'id': '630497', 'name': 'Kulu Safaris Sri Lanka', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 422, 'locationString': 'Yala National Park', 'latitude': 6.390171, 'longitude': 81.373665, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g612381-d630497-Reviews-Kulu_Safaris_Sri_Lanka-Yala_National_Park.html', 'website': 'http://www.kulusafaris.com/', 'address': 'Yala National Park Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': None, 'street2': None, 'city': None, 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': ''}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 2, 'count2': 4, 'count3': 1, 'count4': 18, 'count5': 397}}
column12: We travelled here with the family. The children are 6 and 8 years old. We all enjoyed it very much and we were able to observe many animals. Praba and the whole team looked after us wonderfully and spoilt us. On the safari they were able to show us leopards, bears, crocodiles, peacocks and many birds. Many thanks for everything.

column12: Kulu safaris is a beautiful place with comfortable glamping tents (including aircon and full shower room ). The food is so tasty and was cooked to our personal level of spiciness. Our guides Pramoth and Rohana were both extremely knowledgeable and great fun. They helped us see both Leopards and elephants. The national park is full of other wildlife too which they could point out and tell us about. It made the drives so interesting. Our boys were entranced!  I would not hesitate to recommend Kulu Safaris.
